original_text: They fixed the two onyx stones on the shoulder pieces of the ephod. They showed the names of the 12 sons of Israel, so that the Lord would remember to bless his people. The Lord had commanded Moses to do this.
korean_text: 에봇 어깨받이에 달아 이스라엘의 아들들을 기념하는 보석을 삼았으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 하였더라

sentences.original_text: They fixed the two onyx stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 두 개의 오닉스 보석을 고정했다

sentences.original_text: on the shoulder pieces of the ephod
They showed the names of the 12 sons of Israel
so that the Lord would remember
